Description:
The ResearchStudy resource includes general information about the research studies tracked in Epic, including the title, status, identifier, and principal investigator. These studies focus on the safety, efficacy, comparative effectiveness, and other information about medications, devices, therapies, and other intervention and investigative techniques intended to increase the field of healthcare-related knowledge.

This resource requires additional setup by the organization if they have custom category list values for research study status.
SampleResponse:
{
    "resourceType": "ResearchStudy",
    "id": "erXhPENfYk8OTVVy9R5bleA3",
    "identifier": [
        {
            "use": "official",
            "system": "urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.5325.1.7.3.828372.100",
            "value": "101"
        },
        {
            "use": "usual",
            "system": "http://clinicaltrials.gov",
            "value": " NCT04302"
        }
    ],
    "title": "Pain Management Study",
    "status": "active",
    "description": "The description of the study.",
    "principalInvestigator": {
        "reference": "Practitioner/eflbSK90VWBZBmt0qRlZxaQ3",
        "display": "Physician Beacon, MD"
    },
    "arm": [
        {
            "name": "A",
            "description": "Study Branch A"
        },
        {
            "name": "B",
            "description": "Study Branch B"
        }
    ]
}

arm.Name: arm
arm.Description:
Available starting in the August 2021 Epic version.

A group or subgroup of a research study.

description.Name: description
description.Description: Short explanation of the study path.

description.Name: description
description.Description:
Available starting in the August 2021 Epic version.

What this study is doing.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description:
Business identifier or study code.

The National Clinical Trial (NCT) code is represented as an identifier with the identifier.system of http://clinicaltrials.gov.

Other organization-specific codes will have organizational-specific local identifier systems.

principalInvestigator.Name: principalInvestigator
principalInvestigator.Description: Researcher who oversees multiple aspects of the study.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The current state of the study.
